role.descr: location where something develops, or thing that was there first and undergoes some sort of change as new elements develop from it

example.text: ...with history of sigmoid colon cancer in the past with T3, N1 resected mass that developed liver metastases
example.amr: :ARG1-of (h / history-01 :ARG2 (c / cancer-03 :ARG1 p4 :ARG2 (a / anatomical-site :primary + :name (n2 / name :op1 "sigmoid" :op2 "colon")) :ARG5 (s / sign-symptom :name (n3 / name :op1 "mass") :ARG1-of (r / resect-01) :ARG1-of (a2 / ajcc-entity-91 :ARG3 (t2 / tumor-stage-entity :value "T3") :ARG4 (l / lymph-stage-entity :value "N1"))) :ARG1-of (d / develop-01 :ARG2 (d2 / disease-disorder :pl + :name (n5 / name :op1 "metastasis") :location (a3 / anatomical-site :name (n4 / name :op1 "liver")))) :time (p3 / past)))
